title: Easy Rasmalai
ingredients: ['750ml milk', '150g caster sugar', '80g dried milk powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 egg white', '1 teaspoon rose water', '1 pinch cardamom (elakka) powder', '1 drop yellow food colouring', '1 tablespoon chopped almonds', 'chopped pistachios for garnish', '1 pinch saffron']
